Package <Unnamed>

package
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Board
    Class to implement a Board It has 7 attributes These include an array of Snake objects(pointers) to implement multiple snakes an array of Ladder objects(pointers) to implement multiple ladders 2 int attributes for number of snakes and ladders 2 int attributes for number of rows and columns 1 int attribute for finish position
    Ladder
    Class to implement a ladder It has 2 attributes for the top and bottom of ladder
    LadderAndSnake
    Class to implement the LadderAndSnake game it has 6 attributes 1 int for number of players 1 int array for orders of all players 1 int array for dice rolls of all players 1 int array for positions of all players 1 (pointer to a) Board object 1 boolean attribute to check if the game has ended
    Snake
    Class to implement a snake It has 2 attributes for the head and tail of snake
